snippet: Seersucker in Brooklyn will host "Eat Pork, Help New York" tonight, with four sliders for $10, to benefit the Red Hook Initiative.
abstract: Seersucker in Brooklyn will host "Eat Pork, Help New York" tonight, with four sliders for $10, to benefit the Red Hook Initiative.

headline.main: Pork Sliders for Sandy Relief, and Other Fundraising Events
